title: Software Engineer 2
description: Collaborated on the development of an advanced access control policy, Restricted Access Control, addressing oversharing scenarios.

title: Software Engineer
description: Developed authentication modules in the Reply At Mention (RAM) Service and onboarded the service to the MSAL library, ensuring resilience and security.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description: As an intern in the Fast Data Technologies team, designed and implemented a monitoring service for exception data pipelines and built an alerting system, significantly reducing on-call effort. Developed a safe and dynamic rollout plan for the durable to in-memory queue migration project, based on various data graph types. This flagship initiative reduced IMR by 10% and latency by 40%.
